nodes.short_description: Dive into ExfilZone, the ultimate VR extraction shooter! Craft unique weapons with the Gunsmith system, conquer dynamic missions, and survive intense PvPvE raids. Manage health, stamina, and loot on revamped maps. Outsmart rivals, extract alive, and dominate in the best VR extraction game!

nodes.long_description: Contractors Showdown delivers an immersive military-styled VR First-Person Shooter experience. Engage in heart-pounding combat as you, along with 59 other players, navigate a vast and detailed 16 square-kilometer map. The game centers around a thrilling Battle Royale game mode, where strategic prowess and combat skills are paramount.  Gear up for intense battles, dynamic team play, and a visually stunning VR environment that thrusts players into the forefront of military actions.
nodes.short_description: Contractors Showdown delivers an immersive military-styled VR First-Person Shooter experience that centers around a thrilling Battle Royale game mode, where strategic prowess and combat skills are paramount.

nodes.change_log:
v.1.5.3.0
Fixed shotgun damage anomaly issue
Fixed an issue where locked magazines could be purchased
Fixed an issue where attachments could be duplicated
Fixed character model anomaly issue after grabbing ladders
Explosive Romance: Optimized text with more detailed descriptions
Surveillance 2: Corrected mission objective text
Engineering Obstruction: Corrected marker positions and text
Fixed texture display error for 9x39 ammo box
Fixed Rampage 'Bells' armor rig installation position protrusion issue
Fixed issue with erroneously spawned items on the map
Fixed MP9 fire mode switch model not moving issue
Modified spray paint effects on firearm components

Changed to non-paintable:

M1928 .45acp Long barrel 
M1928 .45acp M1A1 barrel 
M1928 .45acp Short barrel 
M1928 A1 handguard 
M1928 vertical handguard 
M1928 pistol grip 
M1928 Wood stock 

Changed to paintable:

M1928 .45acp 25rnd magazine 
M1928 .45acp 50rnd drum magazine 
SR-3M polymer Black Vertical foregrip 
SR-3M polymer Red Vertical foregrip 
VSS&ASVal suppressor 4 Rail mount 
SR-3M 9x39mm suppressor 
SVD Low mount 
SVD R43 7.62x54mmR suppressor

Patch Notes 1.5.2.0

Fixed a bug where the SF60 magazine could not be properly attached or detached.
Fixed an issue where unclear descriptions made the Hack to Play task difficult to complete.
Fixed a problem where task items did not spawn correctly in Toxicology Recovery.
Adjusted the spawn probability of Large Plier in the game environment.
Adjusted the recoil behavior of the M1928 when firing.
Adjusted the weapon shake of the M1928 when firing.
Fixed an error in the display of recoil values in the store.

Weapon Adjustments:

SVD 7.62x54mmR 410mm Barrel: Firing Power reduced from [+2%] to [-2%].
M1928 .45 ACP Submachine Gun (Lower Receiver): Vertical recoil reduced by [6], horizontal recoil increased by [76.8].
M1928 A1 Handguard: Recoil reduction reduced from [-15%] to [-3%].
M1928 Vertical Handguard: Recoil reduction reduced from [-21%] to [-6%].
M1928 Wood Stock: Recoil reduction reduced from [-23%] to [-17.5%].
M1928 .45 ACP Short Barrel: Firing Power reduced from [-3%] to [-4%], recoil reduction reduced from [-10%] to [-6%].
M1928 .45 ACP Long Barrel: Firing Power increased from [-3%] to [0%], recoil reduction reduced from [-15%] to [-3%].
M1928 .45 ACP M1A1 Barrel: Recoil reduction reduced from [-10%] to [-4%].

1.5.1.0
Fixed an issue where gunsmith bench attachments were not unlocking properly
Fixed an issue where opening crates in-game could cause players to get stuck
Fixed a terrain issue
Adjusted positions of some airdrop crates that couldn’t be entered
Fixed display abnormalities in some UI elements
Adjusted issues with certain items being abnormally unlocked in the store

Patch Note v.1.5.0.0

New Content
● Added Christmas event
● Added Hideout Christmas decoration
● New weapons and attachments
● Added Quick Loadout:
You can store, view, and restore armor presets via the armor loadout station. Restoring armor requires providing an empty armor piece. Saved configurations can be restored through store-purchasable presets; items unavailable in the store cannot be restored.
● Overhauled Dam map: Modified natural terrain of the Dam, optimized POI distribution and structures, redesigned Dam route planning. New POIs added to Dam map: Turbine Field, Lumberyard, Camp#10, Crash Site, Desolate Village, Field Clinic, Weather Outpost
● Added physical gunstock calibration
● Added mechanic: Limb Penetration
	○ Bullets will pass through limb areas and continue flying to hit targets, but penetration consumes the bullet's penetration value and converts damage.
	○ A single bullet may hit multiple body parts.
	○ Penetrating both armor and limbs consumes penetration value. Current limb penetration resistance is 2. Armor-protected areas add to limb resistance. Torso hits on the same character are calculated only once (e.g., chest).
● Added mini-map display for tasks and more
● Added task difficulty indicators

Optimizations and Bug Fixes
● Optimized big map lighting effects, improving visual quality
● Fixed some issues causing server crashes
● Adjusted model sizes for some high-value items, redesigned visual effects for certain items
● Optimized compass display
● Optimized Hideout structure
● Optimized Dam map spawn and exfil points 
● Optimized terrain structures, improving the Dam map performance
● Fixed some known map bugs
● Adjusted armor penetration curves to buff defense for all armor, helmets, and face masks:
	○ All armor uses the same probability curve to calculate bullet penetration.
	○ If bullet penetration > armor protection level, it will definitely penetrate.
	○ If bullet penetration - helmet defense level ≥ 2, it will definitely penetrate.
	○ If armor protection level - bullet penetration ≥ 1, it cannot be penetrated.
● Increased blunt damage reduction coefficients for all armor.
● Added text descriptions for armor's limb protection levels. Limb protection decreases with current armor durability.
● Adjusted damage spread coefficients after limb destruction:
	○ Upper arm: 0.5x → 0.7x
	○ Lower arm: 0.5x → 0.7x
	○ Upper leg: 0.5x → 1.0x
	○ Lower leg: 0.5x → 0.7x
	○ Stomach: 1.5x → 1.1x
● Added 5 new weapons:
	○ SVD 7.62x54R Designated Marksman Rifle
	○ VSS 9x39mm Designated Marksman Rifle
	○ AS Val 9x39mm Assault Rifle
	○ SR-3M 9x39mm Carbine
	○ M1928 .45 ACP Submachine Gun

	○ Modified reputation rewards for some tasks
	○ Increased currency rewards for some early tasks
	○ ANNA trader tasks unlocked in early-mid game, with rewards including top-tier ammo exchanges
